name: Kinich
title: "Turnfire Hunt" Kinich
desc: Fulfiller of Commissions, Flame Bearer of the Canopy.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Kinich to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with him

skills.name: Canopy Hunter: Riding High
skills.desc: Select one of your characters, attach Grapple Link to self, and enter the Nightsoul's Blessing state. Deal 2 Dendro DMG, then switch position with the selected character.

skills.name: Hail to the Almighty Dragonlord
skills.desc: Deal 1 Dendro DMG and create 1 Almighty Dragonlord, Ajaw.
